description: The Road Through 2024 continues for TheChirurgeon as he takes on a local GT, making one last go of it with his Thousand Sons before the Q4 balance update drops them down a peg.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 34: The Dragon’s Lair GT

description: With SAGA Summer in full swing, we’ve covered how to build, play and paint warbands. For everyone diving in to a new period – or if we’ve finally convinced you to pick up Historicals (welcome, it’s great isnt it?) – there’s one thing missing: Terrain. Enter Bandua, who don’t just provide fantastic 40k, Heresy and […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Bandua Age of Crusades Terrain

description: Who Are Rogue & Gambit? We’re all familiar with the X-Men animated series. Even more so now that X-Men 97 has come crashing onto our screens to really showcase what the Marvel Mutants are all about. title: Danger Room Tactics: Rogue & Gambit

description: If you just picked up the Maximum Firepower Squad Pack for Star Wars: Shatterpoint, you’re looking at painting a bunch of white armor yet again. If, like me, you’re feeling a bit burnt out on painting all these clone troopers and stormtroopers, well, at least these look a little different? Specifically, film versions of snowtroopers […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Snowtroopers and Snow Basing for Star Wars Shatterpoint
